title: MINERAL RESOURCE POTENTIAL MAP OF THE WHIPPLE MOUNTAINS AND WHIPPLE MOUNTAINS ADDITION WILDERNESS STUDY AREAS, SAN BERNARDINO COUNTY, CALIFORNIA
base_map: U.S. Geological Survey, 1:62,500: Savahia Peak, 1950; Whipple Mts, 1950; Parker Dam, 1959; Vidal, 1949; Parker, 1949; and Black Peak, 1959
